column2:
"The Casino is still under development!
We'll keep adding more games in the future!"

"Hello!
Did you want to ask me about the Casino Area?"

"...Huh? A black cat...?
I'm sorry, I haven't really heard about anything like that..."
"...Oh, did you just shop in the Shop Area, by any chance...?"
"It was pretty noisy around the entrance, and he may have returned with the male staff..."
"...Anyway, please visit us again in the future!"
